thread.title: Facebook and Twitter's autoplay videos in the firing line after Virginia shooting
thread.title_full: Facebook and Twitter's autoplay videos in the firing line after Virginia shooting - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Facebook and Twitter's autoplay videos in the firing line after Virginia shooting
text: The Virginia shootings in which two journalists were killed on live TV by Vester Flanagan highlighted one of the problems of social media: it can be used for terrible things. If the news of two needless deaths was not enough, countless Facebook and Twitter users were upset by footage of the killings that quickly spread around the social networks, automatically playing for many people. This is not the first time that autoplay videos have been in the news, and it certainly won’t be the last. Now politicians in the UK are calling for Facebook and Twitter to better police content… [Continue Reading] »
